Vote.name: Vote
Vote.description: Represents a vote that a user has made on a Knowledge Article, Idea, or Reply.

IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the object has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false). Label is Deleted.

LastModifiedById.description: ID of the user most recently associated with this vote.

LastModifiedDate.description: The datetime when this vote was last modified.

ParentId.description: ID of the Knowledge Article, Idea, or Reply associated with this vote.

Type.description: Picklist that indicates the type of vote. The value Up indicates that the vote is a user's positive endorsement of the associated idea or reply. The value Down indicates that the vote is a user's negative endorsement of the associated idea or reply.
